metadata.title: CVE-2023-1118 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A flaw use after free in the Linux kernel integrated infraredreceiver/transceiver driver was found in the way user detaching rc device.A local user could use this flaw to crash the system or potentiallyescalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
